content: Emotions are the way of expressing the satisfaction or dissatisfaction of achieving the objectives of the groups/nations of the humans, which they do belong to. This applies to nations, families and groups.
Limitations of the emotions are the social classes, good upbringing, laws, rules, regulations, worries, forbites, expectations and plans.
Bypassing limitations of the emotions do require privileges escalation, reveal of information unknown by one of the sides, deserve or importance.
